title: listing page – all sections
mainAdvice: Explain what your Catalogue Solution is for and how it works. This information will be published on the Buying Catalogue to help buyers understand if it meets their needs.
additionalAdvice: Provide as much information as possible for buyers. You can save your progress at any point, but a Catalogue Solution listing page cannot be published until all mandatory fields have been completed.

about-your-solution.title: About Catalogue Solution
about-your-solution.mainAdvice: Tell buyers about your Catalogue Solution, describe its features and provide information on how it integrates with NHS systems.

client-application-type.title: Client application type
client-application-type.mainAdvice: Let buyers know which types of application will work with your Catalogue Solution.

errorResponse.required: Provide mandatory information for browser-based application
Provide mandatory information for native mobile or tablet application
Provide mandatory information for native desktop application

hosting-type.title: Hosting type
hosting-type.mainAdvice: Provide information to buyers about how your Catalogue Solution can be hosted.

about-your-organisation.title: About organisation
about-your-organisation.mainAdvice: Give details about your organisation and let buyers know how to get in touch.

warningAdvice: All the information provided will be moderated by NHS Digital before it is published on the Buying Catalogue. Future updates to your page must also be submitted for moderation.

sectionsBox.title: Sections added by NHS Digital
sectionsBox.mainAdvice: The following sections of your Catalogue Solution page will be completed for you by NHS Digital. The information will be taken from your Catalogue Solution’s framework tender and capabilities assessment.
